<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>inactive</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.coaching_loops" name="Coaching Loops" version="1.0.0" state="published" type="application" help="Coaching_Loops" provider_name="ServiceNow" licensable="true">
<description>This plugin adds coaching functionality. This plugin facilitates the coaching of employees on their work through the use of coaching opportunities that can be conditionally configured.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.planned_task"/> <import plugin="com.glideapp.custom_charts"/> </requires> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>This plugin adds coaching functionality. This plugin facilitates the coaching of employees on their work through the use of coaching opportunities that can be conditionally configured.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Coaching_Loops</help> <id>com.snc.coaching_loops</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Coaching Loops</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.coaching_loops/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.planned_task,com.glideapp.custom_charts</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.coaching_loops</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
